column5: I am trying to find out where we can buy a license in Kenora? We will not arrive until late in the evening so it would not work picking it up in Winnipeg. Thanks,
Try Sunset Bait and Tackle, it's on east side of town on the old highway, (not on the new bypass that goes north of town). Good luck, wish I were going!!
I concur - Sunset Bait is probably the best spot - it's right across from the Comfort Inn.
